desc.title: Exhibits Introduced
desc.text: Thinking Maitreya (AD 722-765), is now hidden in Kyoto, Japan, Guanglong Temple. 'Thinking Maitreya Buddha' is like the first artifact in all of Japan to be designated as a treasure. Bodhisattva as a Buddhist works of art in the Asuka period. This『Maitreya Bodhisattva half thinking thinking』high hair, full face, bare upper body, body rounded. Nursery thin book posted on the body, the folds clear, better to show the texture of silk. Bodhisattva right hand cheek, was smiling, is a gesture is very elegant and beautiful Buddha.
